body: Hi Mostapha, Chris and djordje, Please, let me know if LB Location Finder works fine. It requires a secure connection because of one of the Google's API. This is a small test where I used chinese and korean characters. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/in24Yk3jlJ8Wb2LinOvkW-jfVFiNJ8YikBGaoRiz0FXFAn4j9tKJXsXzPJ0sPNDTR2fpg1jw5KTeMhDWbAE1R7wpzsIMyF9B/test_LB_locationFinder.png) Best Antonello
